Hello Team,

We have public app listed on market place
and through API we are posting calls
`Endpoint : /crm/v3/objects/calls`
`method : post`

while attaching associations in request body  it gives us error response  `400` as below for particular customer's account and for multiple users

`{"status":"error","message":"one or more associations are not valid","correlationId":"8d98c6f4-b277-4b92-b476-c32fcdbXXXXX","errors":[{"context":{"validationResult":["USER_DOES_NOT_HAVE_PERMISSIONS"]}}],"category":"BAD_REQUEST"}`

if we are not  attaching associations then it logs call successfully.

Can someone from here help me what we are doing wrong here and what can change we can make in customer's account so it can work ?
Error to fix for an account: `USER_DOES_NOT_HAVE_PERMISSIONS`
Thanks.

Hey! So i did some tests and if you use just the first 8 characters until the "-" you get the right file id. (i tested it with like 4 random files so dunno if it works but thats fine for me) used the search files get

<@UK277PCMP> <@U039PUBV59N>
